entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone who is enjoying work, but Ron doubts that he would come home if his dad didn't make him. He's obsessed with his job.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as expressing doubt about Percy's enjoyment of work and warning Harry not to get him onto the subject of his boss.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has received food parcels from Ron, Hermione, and others, which saved his life.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as asking Harry about his summer and whether he got their food parcels.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as someone who has an opinion about Percy's engagement, but the details are not specified.

entities.name: chudley cannons
entities.description: The Chudley Cannons are mentioned as a team that is being watched by Harry on posters in his room.

relationships.description: Ron expresses doubt about Percy's enjoyment of work, saying that he wouldn't come home if his dad didn't make him.
Hermione and others sent food parcels to Harry, which saved his life.
